document.full_text: tampa bay struck twice in the third period to clinch a 4-3 win over washington that pushed the top-seeded capitals to the brink of elimination from the nhl playoffs on tuesday, while vancouver beat nashville 3-2 to go a game up in their series.
document.title: bolts push caps to brink, canucks take 2-1 series
lines_and_colors: tampa bay struck twice in the third period to clinch a 4-3 win over washington that pushed the top-seeded capitals to the brink of elimination from the nhl playoffs on tuesday, while vancouver beat nashville 3-2 to go a game up in their series.
